name: Classic Custom Portrait $50 Per Character
description:
Buy as many 1 Person items as needed for your portrait. Click "Add To Cart" twice for 2 characters  3 times for 3 characters, and so on. Each character costs $50. Children and infants cost the same as adults. Pets are included free of charge.

Purchase the listing first, then below you will find a form to fill out with the specific details of your order. Please fill that out and e-mail nan [!at] nanlawson.com 2-3 photos of who you wish to be in the portrait. I will use that to create the first draft of your portrait. Please be as specific as possible when filling out the form so that I can get the first draft as close to what you want as possible. Once I have completed your first draft I will e-mail you a lo-res version for you to proof. If you wish to have any changes made I will make up to 2 more drafts (3 Total). After all the appropriate changes are made I will send you a high res .JPEG file sized 8 x 10 inches at 300 dpi AND I will ship an 8 x 10 inch print copy to you as well. Turn around is approximately 2 weeks from when you place your order.

If you for some reason wish to not complete your portrait you will be refunded, except for a non-refundable deposit of 1/4 the price you paid.

CUSTOM PORTRAIT ORDER FORM


Brief Physical description of characters:


Please specify exactly what clothing you want the characters to be wearing:


Any special accessories you wish to be included:


Pets? If so please describe:


Any other details you think are important to the creation of this portrait: 


Thanks so much! I look forward to working with you!


Nan

name: Simple Couple Portrait
description:
This listing is for a Custom Portrait of 2 people. Right now I am only offering couple portraits (no pets or kids) in this style. This style is "Simple" which means no (large) accessories, jewelry is okay, and it only features the face, neck, and shoulders. Included options are a heart or speech bubble between the couple with a phrase of your choice.

First place your order, then, below you will find a form to fill out with the specific details of your order. Please fill that out and e-mail nan [!at] nanlawson.com 2-3 photos of who you wish to be in the portrait. I will use that to create the first draft of your portrait. Please be as specific as possible when filling out the form so that I can get the first draft as close to what you want as possible. Once I have completed your first draft I will e-mail you a lo-res version for you to proof. If you wish to have any changes made I will make up to 2 more drafts (3 Total). After all the appropriate changes are made I will send you a high res .JPEG file sized 8 x 10 inches at 300 dpi AND I will ship an 8 x 10 inch print copy to you as well. 

CUSTOM PORTRAIT ORDER FORM

Hair style and colors: 

Please specify exactly what shirt style and color you want the characters to be wearing:

Heart or speech bubble? If the bubble, what would you like it to say?

Thanks so much! I look forward to working with you!

Nan

name: Custom Fan Art Sketch
description: A simple drawing of your favorite fictional character, or perhaps your favorite musician or actor. If you have something specific in the way of poses in mind let me know! If you need to have two characters together I've added that option. No backgrounds - can add a background color if you prefer. This is for a digital file only! I've added the option of a print for an extra $15+ a shipping fee which will be calculated after the print is completed. This will be a one of a kind Nan Lawson piece just for you, I will not sell reproductions of your drawing. Although I may use it for my portfolio or in a blog post if I choose. E-mail nan@nanlawson.com with your order info. Thanks!!!

name: Custom Pet Portrait
description:
This is a listing for a custom pet portrait. The base price is for one pet and only one pet, but I have added options for additional pets.

Purchase the listing first, then below you will find a form to fill out with the specific details of your order. Please fill that out and e-mail nan@nanlawson.com 2-3 photos of your pet. I will use that to create the first draft of your portrait. Please be as specific as possible when filling out the form so that I can get the first draft as close to what you want as possible. Once I have completed your first draft I will e-mail you a lo-res version for you to proof. If you wish to have any changes made I will make up to 2 more drafts (3 Total). After all the appropriate changes are made I will send you a high res .JPEG file sized 8 x 10 inches at 300 dpi AND I will ship an 8 x 10 inch print copy to you as well.

Turn around is approximately 2 weeks from when you return this form to me.

If for some reason you wish to not complete your portrait you will be refunded except for a $25 as a non-refundable deposit.

CUSTOM PORTRAIT ORDER FORM


Brief Physical description of your pet:


Please specify if you would prefer a "bust" (head, neck, some shoulder) or "full body" portrait. If you would prefer a full body, do you have a specific pose in mind?

Nan

description:
